articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S. Ambassador for Flying above S. Korea aboard Fighter
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S. Ambassador for Flying above S. Korea aboard Fighter
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the fact that the U.S. ambassador to south Korea took a F-16 under the U.S. 7th Air Force to fly the sky over south Korea on July 12:
					 This is nothing but a bullying act that can be done only by a deranged man.
					
					 The fact that he who is outwardly a diplomat took the fighter unbecoming for his duty goes to clearly prove that all the U.S. diplomats are real war servants.
					
					 At the moment when the U.S. ever more undisguised hostile moves and nuclear threats against the DPRK are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula, it is a very meaningful thing that the U.S. ambassador to south Korea who personally has a hand in shaping the U.S. DPRK policy and implementing it flew above south Korea aboard fighter.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that such a crazy act was timed to coincide with the U.S. official decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea in the wake of the introduction of nuclear submarines and a formation of B-52Hs and other strategic assets into south Korea.
					
					 The ill-boding moves of the U.S. being observed one after another with the joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian for aggression to be staged in upcoming August indicate its intention to press for the unprecedented acts on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We are closely following these moves of the U.S. and will take stronger self-defensive nuclear countermeasures for defending the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence from the U.S. daily-increasing nuclear war threats.

articles.title: DPRK FM Briefs Asian Diplomatic Envoys on Situation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Briefs Asian Diplomatic Envoys on Situation
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Monday briefed Asian diplomatic envoys here on the situation as regards the presidential statement adopted at the recent Asia-Europe Meeting (ASEM) summit which seriously distorted the essence of the issue of the Korean peninsula.
					 Present at the meeting were Vietnamese, Lao, Cambodian and Malaysian ambassadors to the DPRK and charges d'affaires ad interim of the Mongolian, Indonesian, Iranian, Indian and Pakistani embassies here.
					
					 Choe Hui Chol, director general of the Asian and Oceanian Department of the ministry, clarified the principled stand on the above-said presidential statement adopted at ASEM.
					
					 He recalled that the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia is inching close to the brink of a war owing to the U.S. ceaseless introduction of strategic assets including the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea and the entry of the nuclear-powered submarine Ohio into Pusan Port. However, the adoption of the presidential statement is the reckless action of seriously distorting the reality and following the U.S. extreme hostile policy toward the DPRK, Choe said, and went on:
					
					 Some regional countries still have wrong views that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence is the root cause of escalating tensions on the peninsula and the problem can be solved only when the DPRK exercises "self-restraint."
					
					 Guaranteeing peace on the peninsula is a vital and pressing issue for the DPRK as it is directing all efforts to economic development for building a powerful socialist country. However, such heinous hostile policy of the U.S. toward the DPRK as malignantly hurting even the dignity of its supreme leadership compels it to take a series of multi-phase measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrent. The DPRK will as ever take physical measures to protect its sovereignty and vital rights on a routine basis.
					
					 Choe called on Asian countries to face up to the essence of the present situation and do things helpful to ensuring peace and stability on the peninsula, neither reading others' faces nor dancing to the tune of someone, at the ASEAN regional ministerial conference to be held in Laos.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of Asian countries expressed deep concern over the situation on the peninsula being pushed to the uncontrollable phase owing to the U.S. moves to bolster up its strategic assets and heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK and shared the view that sticking to the fair stand as regards the Korean peninsula issue would be helpful to its settlement.

articles.title: Press Release Issued by North Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference for National Reunification
articles.content:
Press Release Issued by North Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The North Side Preparatory Committee for the Joint Conference of Political Parties, Organizations and Individual Personages of the North and the South and Abroad for Peace and Independent Reunification of the Korean Peninsula issued the following press release on Tuesday:
					 Amid the growing public expectation and concern at home and abroad for a joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad, the north side preparatory committee is proactively stepping up the work for preparing the joint conference.
					
					 The preparatory committee discussed all the issues of making the conference a turning point in preserving peace and security on the Korean peninsula, repairing the north-south relations and paving a broad avenue to independent reunification as desired by all Koreans and took a series of measures to do so. 
					
					 It is also pushing ahead with the work for organizing sub-committees to discuss and settle the practical issues arising in promoting national reconciliation and unity and intensifying the movement for national reunification together with the representatives of political parties, organizations and people of various circles in south Korea and abroad with the joint conference as a momentum.
					
					 It is making sincere arrangements for a variety of the work to make the joint conference significant and colorful.
					
					 Meanwhile, the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea, south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations, Youth Solidarity and other organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea held press conferences and issued statements in support of the proposal for holding the joint conference, saying that it is the one for wide-ranging political negotiations to defuse the daily increasing danger of a war on the Korean peninsula and pave the way to peace and reunification and that it is the fairest proposal for reunification.
					
					 The bodies expressed their will to make efforts to successfully hold the joint conference to the last, condemning the south Korean authorities' refusal to accept the proposal for no reason as an anti-reunification action going against the trend of the times because they claimed that it is a "strategy of the united front for achieving reunification through communization" and "tactics fostering division and conflict in the south".
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to properly understand the ardent desire and unanimous aspiration of all the fellow countrymen to bring about a fresh phase of national reunification and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations through the joint conference and join the whole nation in the efforts to hold the great national conference for reunification.

articles.title: Delegation of Academy of Social Sciences Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Academy of Social Sciences Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Academy of Social Sciences led by Vice President So Kwang Ung returned home Tuesday after visiting China.

articles.title: Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
articles.content:
Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Lombo Khash-Erdene, charge d'affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Mongolian Embassy here Tuesday visited the National Gifts Exhibition House on the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia.
					 The guests made a bow before the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il with broad smile on their faces in the general review room of the house.
					
					 Being briefed on the construction of the house, they went round the gifts presented to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu by people of the DPRK, oversees compatriots and south Koreans.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Should Stop Browbeating: DPRK Scholar
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Should Stop Browbeating: DPRK Scholar
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- As media of south Korea have contended, it is an inveterate habit of traitor Park Geun Hye to browbeat the people, instead of lending an ear to their just demands.
					 Dr. So Song Il, director of the Socio-politics Institute under the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences, said this, commenting on the south Korean people's rapidly-growing protest against the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 Noting that the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea would take no account of the people's fate, he told KCNA:
					
					 Park Geun Hye attended to her own business at a time when the ferry "Sewol" carrying schoolchildren was sinking in the sea.
					
					 In her "presidential" election campaign, she committed herself to "building a new airport in the southeast area of south Korea" to win favor from the inhabitants in North and South Kyongsang provinces. But, later she pretended to be ignorant of this commitment.
					
					 And now she seeks to introduce into Songju of North Kyongsang Province THAAD, war hardware of the U.S. aimed to contain regional big powers, pressing its inhabitants to stop their protest against its deployment.
					
					 The facts go to prove that Park regards the inhabitants in North and South Kyongsang provinces as nothing but a cannon fodder for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen, pursuant to the U.S. war policy.
					
					 She is a wicked woman who makes no scruple of driving all the south Koreans into the abyss of death only to gratify her ambition, flunkeyist and treacherous.
					
					 That's why all Koreans have demanded that Park be put to stern trial of history for having committed all sorts of crimes.

articles.title: Modernization of Footwear Industry Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Modernization of Footwear Industry Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK directs big efforts to modernizing the footwear industry and increasing the proportion of locally available materials in production.
					 Technical innovation is now going on at Ryuwon and Wonsan shoes factories to equip themselves with modern facilities and develop quality products.
					
					 The Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory has concentrated its efforts on the work to produce footwear of various kinds, styles and colors.
					
					 Similar progress is also made at other footwear factories across the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang Shoes Machine Factory has striven to manufacture with its own technology four-way compressors to be supplied to footwear factories. Also a technical innovation campaign was launched at different factories to turn out plastic sole.

articles.title: Chojong Mineral Water
articles.content:
Chojong Mineral Water
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The service of mineral water of various kinds is becoming brisk at public catering outlets of the DPRK now in sweltering summer.
					 Among those kinds is Chojong mineral water from Chojong-ri, Unchon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 It is the country's one and only mineral water without iron ingredient, which was designated as one of the nation's natural monuments and a specialty of Korea.
					
					 This mineral water has been well known as a health drink since about 1580, according to a historical document.
					
					 It contains tens of kinds of mineral matters and microelements in natural state and has various tastes such as hot, sweet, fresh and cold.
					
					 The water helps clean cellular tissues of human body and absorb mineral matters and microelements as much as possible.
					
					 It is also efficacious for reducing the viscosity of blood and preventing hemoconcentration and thrombus.

articles.title: American Ambassador to S. Korea Termed Mentally Deranged Hooligan
articles.content:
American Ambassador to S. Korea Termed Mentally Deranged Hooligan
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- It was reported that U.S. Ambassador to south Korea Lippert flew the sky above Seoul aboard F-16 belonging to the 7th Air Force of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea on July 12.
					 A career diplomat Lippert boarded the fighter that had been additionally deployed in the U.S. air force base in Osan for a war drumbeat. This clearly proves that he is a heinous war maniac far surpassing the successive colonial governors who had found their way to south Korea.
					
					 Even the puppet media expressed shock at it, calling it the first of its kind. 
					
					 It seems Lippert staged the flight farce out of his calculation to "demonstrate" strong "commitment to security" before the Park Geun Hye puppet group which is taken aback by the signal growth of the might of the DPRK and to give a shot in the arm of the group but this is gross miscalculation.
					
					 Strategic bombers of the U.S. forces professing "God of war" took to flight after they had found their way to south Korea by stealth, fearing the powerful defence capabilities of the DPRK and its ensuing control of territorial air. Lippert's act reminds one of a lame guy dancing under moonlight and a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger. 
					
					 In the 1950s war merchant Dulles was reported to have picked up a golden-bell flower in a trench south of the 38th Parallel in a bid to instigate the Syngman Rhee puppet forces to ignite a war. But this led to the bitter result of the first-ever defeat in American history.
					
					 World community commented: "The final war to be waged by the DPRK against the U.S. and other hostile forces will not be confined to the boundary of the Korean peninsula as it was in the past. Not only the Korean peninsula but the vast waters and regions in the Pacific where the U.S. forces and their bases are stationed will turn into war theatres and even the U.S. mainland across the ocean will become the center of battlefield."
					
					 If Lippert had paid heed to these voices, he would not have gone so foolish as to bring the dark clouds of a war to the U.S. mainland.
					
					 Last year Lippert, whose face was all over with blood as he failed to stop a knife attack by an ordinary south Korean man, now entered the range of merciless strike by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK which are waiting for a moment for mounting annihilating blows. So wretched are the fate of Lippert himself and the U.S. which hurled him into it.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms Park Geun Hye Modern Day Traitor
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms Park Geun Hye Modern Day Traitor
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A strong wave of protests sweeps south Korea after the decision to deploy THAAD there was announced.
					 Inhabitants of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, in particular, are staging strong protests such as hunger strike, writing petition in blood, hair cutting and candle-light actions, threatened with forcible evacuation from their cradle and seized with uneasiness about possible retaliatory nuclear strike after their area was chosen as a site for THAAD deployment.
					
					 The south Korean puppet "prime minister" and the minister of defense, who had gone to the county to persuade its inhabitants into offering the land as the site for the deployment of the war monster called THAAD, have been stuck for six and a half hours, pelted with water bottles and eggs by local inhabitants. They suffered the shame of taking to flight after having a hard time.
					
					 At a time when the whole of south Korea has turned into a mayhem over the issue of THAAD deployment, neighboring countries are becoming increasingly critical of it as they are exposed to an ever more undisguised military threat of the U.S.
					
					 But, the Park Geun Hye group, the chief architect of the crisis, is ordering its yes men to "stop the unnecessary dispute over THAAD" and round off its deployment as quickly as possible, spouting sheer sophism that "it is of defensive nature to cope with the north's nuclear and missile threat" and "it is an inevitable step for security and existence of the people."
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime's decision to allow THAAD deployment is the worst act of treachery as it offers the U.S. an excuse to perpetuate the illegal presence of its forces which has lasted for 70 odd years and the split of the Korean nation.
					
					 Since the first day of her office Park has zealously fawned up the U.S., welcoming its introduction of nukes and missiles into south Korea which have brought constant danger of war to the Korean peninsula. She, however, desperately cried out for dismantling the treasured sword of the DPRK for self-defence which has ensured peace and security of the nation.
					
					 THAAD will rapidly escalate military tensions in Asia-Pacific.
					
					 South Korea, a forefront base and nuclear outpost of the U.S. for carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific, will become a primary target of the neighboring countries and an igniting point of a new world war. Consequently, south Koreans cannot but fall victim to it.
					
					 Park is, indeed, a disgrace and a source of trouble for the nation as she is making no scruple of offering land to outsiders as a war servant at a time when many countries are involved in a hot race for defending their sovereignty and national interests.
					
					 She will never be able to escape the severest punishment by the nation.

articles.title: Nobody Can Check Advance of Koreans for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nobody Can Check Advance of Koreans for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Nobody can check the dynamic advance of the Koreans to achieve independent reunification by rejecting outside forces and pooling their efforts, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to achieve national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the Koreans, by weathering the harsh ordeals in the spirit of national independence and great unity.
					
					 This time the DPRK initiated a great national conference for reunification and is making every effort to realize it. This stemmed from the patriotic stand to pave the way for improving the north-south relations and achieving national reunification in reflection of the will and aspiration of all Koreans.
					
					 The issue of national reunification should be settled from an independent stand under any circumstances as it is the internal matter of the Korean nation.
					
					 All Koreans have the strength and wisdom to achieve national reunification.
					
					 The proposal of the DPRK to hold a great national conference for reunification is the fairest one based on the transparent independent stand to settle the issue of reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans in a responsible manner, not by relying on outsiders.
					
					 There is no reason for the south Korean authorities to refuse to respond to our proposal if they have even an iota of national conscience,
					
					 National reunification is not achievable by anybody's approval or with anybody's help.
					
					 To peddle the matter of reunification, the domestic issue of the nation, here and there and implore outside forces for cooperation is an act of selling off the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					 All Koreans should have the transparent stand of independence that they should worship the Korean nation, believe in its strength and discuss the issue of reunification with compatriots. There will be no obstacle insurmountable in the inter-Korean relations if they proceed from this stand.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Disallowing Interview with Abductees of DPRK by UN Human Rights Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Disallowing Interview with Abductees of DPRK by UN Human Rights Organization
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet group refused to allow the interview with abductees of the DPRK by the UN human rights organization under an absurd pretext.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this a cynical ploy to cover up the truth behind crimes committed by them.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If citizens of the DPRK went to south Korea of their own accord as claimed by the puppet group, there is no reason to refuse to comply with the demand of south Koreans and the international community for opening their fate to public and allowing interview with them.
					
					 The "voluntary defection from the north" much touted by the group of traitors is a downright lie and nothing but a fig-leaf to cover up the truth behind the horrible criminal act of keeping the abductees of the DPRK in custody.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for such heinous kidnappers to pull up the DPRK over its "human rights" after unhesitatingly committing the above-said unethical atrocity, pursuant to their policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The increased frenzy on the part of the Park Geun Hye group to hide the truth behind the thrice-cursed abduction of citizens of the DPRK would only harden its will to probe the truth to the last.
					
					 If the puppet group feel afraid of experiencing a hot agony of shame in face of  the international  community and meeting destruction, they should reveal the truth behind the abduction, make an apology to the nation, though belatedly, and send the abductees back to the fold of their parents without delay.

articles.title: DPRK Will Watch U.S. Attitude: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Watch U.S. Attitude: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Doug Bandow, senior fellow at the Cato Institute in the U.S., posted on the homepage of the U.S. magazine National Interest an article saying that scarcely a week goes by without a new insult or threat emanating from Pyongyang directed at America, Pyongyang does not spend the time denouncing Mexico or threatening to turn Toronto into a lake of fire, it does not vilify Europe at every opportunity, Brazil and Nigeria do not make Pyongyang's enemy list, Pyongyang is targeting America with weapons, if Washington were not threatening Pyongyang with war, it wouldn't waste its breath on America, and the justification for U.S. troops in Korea disappeared decades ago. And the article insisted on the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					 This is the cold analysis based on the objective clarification of the reason why did the DPRK have access to nukes and militarily press the U.S. and where is the way for the U.S. to get rid of the mire of destruction, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The only way for the U.S. to escape from its miserable doom is to withdraw its troops from south Korea as early as possible and take hands off the issue of the Korean peninsula. It is the only way to ensure the security of the U.S. mainland.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its nuclear war racket, keeping its forces in south Korea, the DPRK will continue bolstering up the nuclear strike capability targeting the U.S. mainland for the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The DPRK will watch the attitude of the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Trying to Hide Their Scenario for Militarist Overseas Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Trying to Hide Their Scenario for Militarist Overseas Aggression
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Defence of Japan recently announced a projected contract on the purchase of fighters worth 40 billion US dollars with Boeing and Lockheed Martin.
					 The Japanese reactionaries are claiming that this was required by the measures to bolster up the capabilities of the air force and air defence in order to cope with the increasing Sino-Japan naval dispute and the worsening Sino-Japan relations.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Tuesday says that this is nothing but renewed sophism to hide the black-hearted scenario for militarist overseas aggression.
					
					 It has always been a national policy of the Japanese reactionaries to turn Japan into a military power and realize the ambition for militarist overseas aggression. This policy has been pursued with increased frenzy under the Abe regime.
					
					 Having provided with a legal guarantee for overseas aggression, the Japanese reactionaries are desperately pursuing their policy of arms buildup to put their physical means for it on a high level. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that they are putting increased spurs to the modernization of the "Self-Defense Forces," considering the present time when the U.S. is working in real earnest to carry out its strategy for rebalancing in Asia-Pacific as the golden chance for converting their country into a military giant.
					
					 This proves that they are dangerous forces of aggression and war disturbing the peace and stability in Northeast Asia.
					
					 In case Japan persistently opts for igniting a war, revealing its true colors as a militarist serpent, this would only precipitate its doom. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop at once their reckless military action going against the trend of the times, well aware of the will of the international community for peace.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Puppet Regime's Pro-Japanese Act
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Puppet Regime's Pro-Japanese Act
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- It was known that mandarins of the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea attended a ceremony marking the anniversary of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" at the Japanese Embassy in Seoul recently, sparking off great uproar among people of all social standings.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary condemns this as a mockery and insult to the Korean nation harboring towering grudge against the shuddering crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past as it is another act of treachery on the part of the Park Geun Hye group keen on escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that this was a vivid expression of more undisguised pro-Japanese act of the Park group as it is putting spurs to the military collusion and nexus with the Japanese reactionaries, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said quislings' participation in the ceremony held in the heart of Seoul made it clearer that the formation of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance has reached a grave stage.
					
					 This is a product of the U.S. hegemonic policy to invade the DPRK with the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces as cannon fodder and, furthermore, realize its ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the Japanese reactionaries wholeheartedly welcomed the criminal decision made by the puppet group to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is getting frantic in its moves to realize its ambition for stifling the DPRK while tightening the collusion and nexus with the gangster-like U.S. imperialists and the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemies of the Korean nation, but it is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The desperate efforts of the Park group to tide over its ruling crisis and realize its pipedream for achieving "unification of social systems" at any cost through sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces would only bring earlier its self-ruin.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe Anniversary of Publication of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe Anniversary of Publication of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Tuesday's newspapers of the DPRK dedicate articles to marking the 16th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that in July, 2000 Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, visited the DPRK during which a historical summit of the two countries was held and the said declaration was adopted, adding:
					
					 The joint declaration served as an example and motive force in ensuring sound development of the international relations and preserving global peace.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have developed with dynamism at a high level since the adoption of the declaration.
					
					 The DPRK and Russia are the neighbors sharing the same border and their friendly relations are long-standing and traditional.
					
					 It is beneficial for ensuring peace and stability not only in the two countries but in the whole of Northeast Asia to value and develop the bilateral friendly ties.
					
					 The whole course of developing the relations between the two countries proved that their friendly ties are in full line with their desire, wishes and interests.
					
					 Only when the two countries value and add luster to the history of friendship and its tradition and the common fruits reaped in its course, can they develop their friendly relations on a new high stage under any conditions and circumstances.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever continue striving to boost the friendly relations with Russia in the spirit of the joint declaration.
					
					 Minju Joson notes it is the invariable stand and will of the Korean people to develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the Russian people.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Quarters Put in Quandary for Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Quarters Put in Quandary for Decision on THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet ruling quarters underwent humiliation in the face of strong protest by inhabitants in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, the place chosen for the deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					 When the puppet prime minister and the Defense minister appeared in the county in the morning of July 15 for a briefing aimed to calm down the public protesting against the THAAD deployment, thousands of citizens pelted them with eggs and water bottles.
					
					 The prime minister made all rhetorical flourishes to express his regret for having failed to inform in advance the citizens of the decision. He even made imprudent remarks about "the north's nuclear provocation" to justify their sycophantic and treacherous act.
					
					 The Defense minister also said that he would scientifically prove that the electromagnetic wave is not harmful to health.
					
					 The puppet ruling quarters barely escaped the venue of the briefing and took a car.
					
					 But they had hard time on a car being encircled by the citizens for than 6.5 hours, before fleeing to Seoul by helicopter.

articles.title: U.S. Ambassador to S. Korea Lays Bare His True Colors as War Maniac
articles.content:
U.S. Ambassador to S. Korea Lays Bare His True Colors as War Maniac
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- U.S. Ambassador to south Korea Lippert flew over Seoul on July 12 aboard a F-16 fighter of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces for the first time, sparking public uproar, said MBC of south Korea.
					 As already reported, the U.S. imperialists are massively introducing strategic weapons and various other nuclear war means into south Korea, bringing to light their scenario to invade the DPRK. This war drumbeat is linked with the large-scale anti-north joint war rehearsal slated to take place in August.

articles.title: Residents of Songju County, S. Korea Hold Candlelight Rally
articles.content:
Residents of Songju County, S. Korea Hold Candlelight Rally
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Checking the THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a candlelight rally in front of the building of the Songju County Office of North Kyongsang Province on July 18 in protest against the decision of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime on the deployment of THAAD, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Thousands of country residents from all walks of life were attending the 6th rally.
					
					 The participants demanded the regime withdraw the decision.
					
					 They denounced the regime for hurling abuses at those opposing the THAAD deployment and branding them as "Reds".
					
					 They expressed their firm determination to force the regime to withdraw the decision by the concerted efforts of the county residents.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Stages Urgent Action in Protest against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Stages Urgent Action in Protest against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration staged an urgent action in Taejon on July 14 in protest against the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group's decision on THAAD deployment, according to Tongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The dispute on the THAAD "efficiency" is mounting, the organization said, adding that the THAAD deployment only escalates the military tension on the Korean peninsula and sparks a new Cold War.
					
					 At a time when the inter-Korean relations are at the lowest ebb, the THAAD deployment is little short of igniting the fuse leading to powder magazine, the organization said, adding that not only Songju but also any other area of south Korea should not be offered for the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Korean CBS Ridicules Regime's Ruling Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean CBS Ridicules Regime's Ruling Crisis
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea on July 12 ridiculed the wretched plight of the Park Geun Hye regime facing a ruling crisis.
					 Noting the ship called "Republic of Korea" with Park as its captain is shaking, the radio said her regime is showing the symptom of crisis too early in the last period of its tenure of office.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 All crewmen of the ship including navigation officer and steersman are separately moving. It seems that they are indifferent to the agony of their captain.
					
					 That's why the floor leader of the Minju Party of south Korea demanded a wholesale cabinet reshuffle, terming the present cabinet a "bungler."
					
					 Good state administrative capability and people's trust are needed to help the tilting ship keep its balance.
					
					 The present regime should comply with the demand of people, not resorting to a stop-gap measure to pacify them.

articles.title: U.S. Magazine Asserts Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Magazine Asserts Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The National Interest, the U.S. magazine dealing with international relations, asserted the pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea, according to Jaju Sibo, an internet paper of south Korea, on July 15.
					 The magazine said that the U.S. needs to seek completely different approaches to the DPRK such as withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea in the future.
					
					 Referring to diverse necessities of the U.S. forces withdrawal, the magazine said it would substantially help ensure the security of the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. hadn't threatened the DPRK with its military muscle, the DPRK could have changed its policy towards the U.S., it said, adding:
					
					 The latter's access to nukes was the best measure taken by it not to follow suit of Libya and other countries.
					
					 The justification for U.S. troops' presence in south Korea disappeared decades ago and the withdrawal of its troops from south Korea would provide the justification for the denuclearization on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Christians Oppose Japan's Revision of Peace Constitution
articles.content:
S. Korean Christians Oppose Japan's Revision of Peace Constitution
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches criticized Japan's for trying to revive militarism, according to CBS of south Korea on July 12.
					 Noting Japan is set to modify the Article 9 of its peace constitution forbidding it to unleash a war and possess an army, the council said the revision will endanger the security in Northeast Asia including the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It called on all churches and forces of conscience in the world to turn out in the campaign for preventing the revision.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Support Proposal for Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Support Proposal for Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The East Regional Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on July 11 issued a statement supporting the proposal for a great national conference for reunification.
					 The statement said that the organization extends positive support to the DPRK's proposal to hold a joint conference of all parties, social organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula on the 71st anniversary of the liberation of Korea, and will work hard to successfully hold the joint conference.
					
					 The statement renewed the determination to let the Korean community know about the significant joint conference and do the best to form a regional preparatory committee together with compatriots.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Romanian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Romanian Figure 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, posted an article titled "Peerless strategist" on a website on July 13 in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The article:
					
					 It is a brilliant fruit of the outstanding strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung that the just two-years old DPRK won a miraculous victory in a severe war against the U.S. with the most powerful military muscle, economic power and long-standing history of aggression and its followers.
					
					 He created his original military tactics and thus recorded a brilliant page in the history of modern wars.
					
					 The numerical and technical superiority of the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world were shattered by the strategic and tactical superiority of the Korean People's Army wisely led by him.
					
					 Indeed, his immortal exploits for war victory and heroic and self-sacrificing spirit of the army and people of the DPRK united close around him will shine forever.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign media observed the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung between July 5 and 8.
					 Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba introduced the undying exploits of the President, saying that the Korean people are looking back on the exploits he performed for the times and history on July 8.
					
					 The Bangladeshi papers The Daily Folk and Dainik Probat in the articles referred to the ideological and theoretical achievements and leadership feats of the President, praising him as a great man who is respected as a kind-hearted father by the people for his dedication to them.
					
					 Renaissance Radio of Guinea introduced immortal flower Kimilsungia in detail, adding that the President is always alive in the hearts of the world progressive people aspiring after independence along with the flower.
					
					 The Guinean Domestic, International and Seven National Languages Broadcasting Services spoke highly of the President for performing great exploits to go down through centuries with his outstanding ideology and theory and sweeping revolutionary activities, noting that he is, indeed, the most prominent leader in the 20th century, peerlessly great man and great sage of mankind and that his idea and cause have been carried forward though he passed away.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Takes Place in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Takes Place in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Belogradchik City, Bulgaria on July 14 in the month of solidarity with the Korean people.
					 Attending the meeting were Bulgarian figures of various circles and invited there were the DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria and members of his embassy.
					
					 The mayor of the city in a report referred to the significance of the meeting in his city in the month of solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 Speakers including the chief of a friendly club in Vidin City under the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said that the world progressive people set the period from June 25 to July 27 as the month of solidarity with the Korean people and extend firm support and solidarity to them.
					
					 They said that the army and people of the DPRK led by President Kim Il Sung beat back the U.S. imperialists in the three-year-long severe war kicked off by the latter for the first time in history and won the brilliant victory.
					
					 They lauded Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for working heart and soul to accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Polish Figures
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Polish Figures
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place in Warsaw, Poland on July 14 on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The honorary chairperson of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and other speakers praised President Kim Il Sung for humbling the pride of the arrogant U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world with his rare stratagem and outstanding commanding art and leading the war to victory.
					
					 They noted that leader Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state, satellite manufacturing and launching state which nobody dare provoke under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 They expressed firm support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the building of a powerful socialist country and independent reunification of Korea with a firm grasp on the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Are Totally to Blame for Bedeviling Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Are Totally to Blame for Bedeviling Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: Nigerian Figure
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on July 14 in support of the statement released by a spokesman for the DPRK government.
					 He said that the Korean people have lived in an unstable climate, neither war nor peace, being exposed to the U.S. persistent nuclear threat and blackmail for several decades.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 That the DPRK had access to the powerful deterrent capable of completely restraining the outsiders' nuclear threat and preemptive strike despite all sorts of trials is the inevitable strategic option for establishing the system of durable peace on the Korean peninsula and, furthermore, realizing the denuclearization of the whole peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. continues to impose the unprecedented nuclear threat upon the DPRK while shipping all sorts of tactical nuclear weapons to south Korea and staging various nuclear war exercises against the latter every year.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are working hard to ignite a nuclear war at any cost while aligning themselves with the U.S. moves to retain the nuclear hegemony on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities who are chiefly to blame for spawning and worsening the nuclear issue on the peninsula should accept the principled demand of the DPRK for denuclearization of the peninsula without any precondition, not trumpeting about the so-called "denuclearization of the north".

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Blame U.S. for Its Nuclear War Moves
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Blame U.S. for Its Nuclear War Moves
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 12 in denunciation of the U.S. which is increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists' vicious politically-motivated military provocations aimed at escalating tension on the peninsula are making the DPRK take a resolute and strong countermeasure.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists resort to whatever politically-motivated military provocations to invade the DPRK.
					
					 However, their plan for aggression can never be realized.
					
					 In case a nuclear war breaks out on the peninsula, the U.S. imperialists are bound to meet a merciless countermeasure by the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 The U.S. war maniacs were clearly warned by the KPA.
					
					 We fully support self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: French Body Assails the U.S. and S. Korea's Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
French Body Assails the U.S. and S. Korea's Decision on THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The France-DPRK Friendship Association posted an article on its website on July 14 bashing the decision of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces on deploying THAAD in south Korea.
					 The article said the decision was made by the U.S. obsessed by the ambition to maintain military supremacy in the Asia-Pacific and establish domination over it and by its followers, south Korean authorities.  The article went on:
					
					 The THAAD which is to be controlled by the U.S. in south Korea is allegedly to be put in service from next year.
					
					 This means it will be deployed in south Korea before the "presidential election" next year.
					
					 So, Park Geun Hye representatiing the south Korean conservative ruling forces with fat chance in the election is hurrying the deployment.
					
					 Her self-opinionated mode of rule and frivolous streak are hardly different from those of her father who drenched south Korea with blood of its people through his military fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia sobrevuelo de embajador estadounidense en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia sobrevuelo de embajador estadounidense en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el embajador norteamericano en el Sur de Corea sobrevolo hace poco a bordo de un caza esta mitad de la Peninsula Coreana, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 19 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 12, el embajador estadounidense en el Sur de Corea dio una vuelta en el cielo surcoreano a bordo de un caza tipo F-16 de la septima fuerza aerea norteamericana estacionada en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Es una canallada de que es capaz solo un psicopata. 
					
					Ese acto incompatible con el cargo de diplomatico comprueba que todos los diplomaticos estadounidenses son sirvientes de guerra. 
					
					Resulta muy sospechosa la gira aerea del embajador norteamericano, que toma parte directa en la elaboracion y ejecucion de la politica de su pais sobre Corea, en la situacion actual en que se cierne el nubarron de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana debido a las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras hostiles y amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC. 
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que el sobrevuelo coincide con la introduccion sucesiva en el Sur de Corea de los submarinos nucleares, la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos B-52H y otras propiedades estrategicas norteamericanas y con la toma de la decision oficial sobre el emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles THAAD en suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Los sospechosos movimientos de EE.UU., que se reportan uno tras otro en visperas de los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian que tendran lugar en agosto, prenuncian que ese pais intenta cometer acciones sin precedentes en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Observamos con aguda vigilancia tales movimientos de EE.UU. y tomaremos con mayor intensidad las contramedidas nucleares de autodefensa para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a la vida de la nacion desde la creciente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.

articles.title: MINREX concede encuentro de aviso de situacion para delegados diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
articles.content:
MINREX concede encuentro de aviso de situacion para delegados diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organizo hoy un encuentro de aviso de situacion para los delegados diplomaticos de los paises asiaticos en la RPDC con respecto a que en la reciente reunion cumbre Asia-Europa (ASEM) fue aprobada una declaracion presidencial que tergiversa seriamente la esencia del problema de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los embajadores extraordinarios y plenipotenciarios de Vietnam, Laos, Camboya y Malasia y los encargados de negocios a. i de Mongolia, Indonesia, Iran, India y Pakistan, en la RPDC. 
					
					Choe Hui Chol, director general de Asia y Oceania de la cancilleria coreana, expuso la posicion de principios relativa a la declaracion presidencial de la ASEM. 
					
					El asevero que la declaracion en cuestion tergiversa las realidades en que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y de la region de Nordeste Asiatico llega al umbral de guerra debido a las incesantes tentativas de introduccion de bienes estrategicos por parte del pais norteamericano tales como la decision del emplazamiento de THAAD y la entrada del submarino nuclear Ohio en el Puerto de Pusan, y prosiguio:
					
					Hasta la fecha, algunos paises regionales tienen todavia un criterio erroneo de que la intensificacion del disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo de la RPDC es causa raigal de la agravacion de tension de la Peninsula Coreana y que se puede solucionar ese problema solo cuando la RPDC "se contenga". 
					
					El aseguramiento de paz de la Peninsula Coreana se presenta como el problema vital para la RPDC que dedica toda la fuerza al desarrollo economico para la construccion de potencia socialista. Pero, la perversa politica hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos que calumnia brutalmente hasta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC le obliga a esta a fortalecer de manera escalonada y sucesiva su disuasivo nuclear. En lo adelante tambien, la RPDC tomara normalmente las medidas fisicas para defender su soberania y derecho a la existencia. 
					
					Los paises asiaticos deben ver correctamente la esencia de la situacion actual y no deben observar la actitud de otros ni bailar al son de que les tocan otros, sino hacer los trabajos utiles al aseguramiento de paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana en la reunion ministerial del Foro de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico que tendra lugar en Laos. 
					
					Los participantes expresaron la profunda preocupacion de que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se acerca a la fase incontrolable debido al incremento de bienes estrategicos de EE.UU y su perversa politica hostil a la RPDC. Y manifestaron la simpatia por el hecho de que solo el mantenimiento de la posicion imparcial ayudara la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Publicado comunicado del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para Conferencia Conjunta
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para Conferencia Conjunta 
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo publicado este martes un comunicado del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para la Conferencia Conjunta de los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					El texto sigue abajo:
					
					En estos tiempos en que se aumentan cada dia mas la esperanza y atencion de los nacionales y extranjeros sobre la Conferencia Conjunta de partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana, el comite preparatorio de la parte Norte acelera con dinamismo los preparativos para esta cita. 
					
					Ante todo, discutio los problemas para hacer de la Conferencia Conjunta una oportunidad de viraje para garantizar la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y abrir las posibilidades de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente conforme a la voluntad y aspiracion de toda la nacion, y tomo una serie de medidas. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, impulsa las labores para organizar las subcomisiones para consultar y tomar medidas en la Conferencia Conjunta con los delegados de partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades de diferentes estratos del Sur de Corea y en ultramar los problemas practicos que se presentan en fomentar la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y activar el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Tambien, prepara con sinceridad los trabajos para decorar la Conferencia Conjunta de manera significativa y diversificada. 
					
					Por otra parte, las entidades y personalidades de diferentes estratos del Sur de Corea inclusive el Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria, la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS), la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (FSS), la Federacion Nacional de Asociaciones de Campesinos y la Solidaridad Juvenil senalaron que la propuesta sobre la apertura de la Conferencia Conjunta deviene la mas ampliada reunion consultiva politica y el mas justo proyecto de reunificacion para prevenir el cada dia mas creciente peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y abrir el camino de la paz y la reunificacion. Y concedieron las entrevistas de prensa e hicieron publicas las declaraciones para apoyarla. 
					
					Esas entidades expresaron la voluntad de esforzarse hasta el final por la apertura exitosa de la conferencia conjunta, tras calificar de acto anti-reunificacion y desafiante a la corriente de la epoca el hecho de que las autoridades surcoreanas niegan a ciegas la propuesta de la RPDC de abrir esa cita describiendola como "estrategia del frente unido para la unificacion mediante el comunismo" y la "tactica para fomentar la division y la discordia entre los surcoreanos".
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben aceptar la apertura del gran conclave pannacional por la reunificacion, al ver correctamente el ferviente deseo y unanime aspiracion de todos los coreanos a abrir nueva coyuntura en la reunificacion del pais y en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas aprovechando esa ocasion.
